name: CAP FLOW
desc: Glen Rock, NJ-based private commercial lending platform specializing in invoice factoring, accounts receivable financing, inventory funding, and purchase order financing. Over $1B in working capital provided since 2009.

leaders.bg: Co-founded CapFlow Funding Group in 2009. The three managing partners bring 60+ years of institutional investment banking experience in credit and ABL markets.
Co-founded CapFlow Funding Group bringing institutional investment banking experience to the factoring and ABL space.

name: CLEARBANC
desc: Toronto-based fintech (now Clearco) providing non-dilutive, revenue-based financing for DTC e-commerce brands. Has deployed $8B+ to 8,000+ businesses. Offers fixed and rolling funding capacity plus invoice funding.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Clearco (formerly Clearbanc), deploying $8B+ in non-dilutive funding to 8,000+ e-commerce businesses. Dragon on CBC's Dragons' Den.
Co-founded Clearco and served as original CEO before transitioning to Executive Chairman to focus on strategic direction.

name: COAST FUNDING
desc: San Diego, CA-based non-bank funding source founded in 2020, providing business lines of credit, revenue-based financing, short-term loans, equipment financing, and receivables financing from $10K to $500K.

leaders.bg: CEO of Coast Funding, leading the San Diego-based non-bank funder committed to responsible lending with rates starting at 2.99%.

name: CREST CAPITAL
desc: Equipment financing and leasing company based in Alpharetta, Georgia, founded in 1989. Specializes in providing equipment leasing and financing solutions up to $500K for small and medium-sized businesses.

leaders.bg: Leads Crest Capital's equipment financing operations serving SMBs nationwide since 1989.
Oversees financial operations for one of the top-rated equipment financing companies in the US.

name: DEXT CAPITAL
desc: Independent equipment finance company specializing in healthcare financing, headquartered in Lake Oswego, Oregon. Backed by Sightway Capital (Two Sigma) and has surpassed $2 billion in originations.

leaders.bg: 25-year veteran in equipment leasing, previously Chief Corporate Officer at TCF Financial and held positions at US Bank and GE Capital.
currentHooks: Ex-GE Capital, US Bank, TCF Bank

name: EAGLE CAPITAL
desc: MCA and business funding company operating under the Quick Capital Fund brand in New York, providing merchant cash advances and working capital to small businesses.

leaders.bg: Operates as Quick Capital Fund providing MCA and business funding solutions in New York.

name: EASTERN FUNDING
desc: Leading equipment finance company serving laundry, car wash, grocery, and specialty vehicle industries, founded in 1997. Subsidiary of Brookline Bank with Nancy Robles recently promoted to CEO.

leaders.bg: Promoted to CEO in 2025 after long tenure managing operations, compliance, documentation, and technology. Recognized as 2025 Champion of Inclusivity by Monitor.
Founded Eastern Funding in 1997, now focusing on relationship cultivation and mentoring sales and leadership teams.
Recently joined Eastern Funding to drive operational excellence and enhance customer experience.

name: EBF HOLDINGS LLC
desc: Revenue-based financing provider operating as Everest Business Funding, founded in 2013 in Miami, Florida by serial entrepreneur Scott Crockett. Provides fast working capital to small businesses.

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur who raised over $250M in capital and created thousands of jobs over 20+ year career. Previously founded Allied Cash Holdings with 250+ stores generating $60M+ in annual revenue. Tulane University graduate.

name: EIN CAPITAL
desc: New York City-based MCA direct funder established in 2008, specializing in merchant cash advances for small and medium-sized businesses across North America. Provides funding up to 4th position.

leaders.bg: Leads Ein Cap's operations as a direct MCA funder serving thousands of small businesses nationwide.
Founded Ein Cap to provide merchant cash advances to underserved small businesses, building a multi-million dollar funding operation.

name: ELEVATION CAPITAL
desc: Direct funder providing alternative financing options for small to medium-sized businesses, based in Bel Air, Maryland. Founded in 2010, has provided over $150 million to 2,500+ businesses through MCAs and other products.

leaders.bg: Leads Elevation Capital Group as both owner and president, overseeing MCA and alternative business financing operations that have funded $150M+ to 2,500+ businesses.

name: EVERLASTING CAPITAL
desc: National business finance solutions provider in Rochester, New Hampshire, co-founded in 2012 by Josh Feinberg and Will Murphy. Ranked on the Inc. 500 and #1 fastest-growing company in New Hampshire. Offers equipment financing and working capital.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Everlasting Capital in 2012 from his basement, grew it to Inc. 500 ranking and #1 fastest-growing company in New Hampshire. Hands-on in day-to-day operations.
Co-founded Everlasting Capital with Josh Feinberg, oversees day-to-day operations and financial strategy. Certified Equipment Broker School graduate.

name: EXPRESS CAPITAL FUNDING
desc: Direct lender in Anaheim, California providing working capital loans and equipment financing to specialty contractors, manufacturing companies, government contractors, and trucking companies. Founded in 2013.

leaders.bg: Founded Express Capital Funding in 2013, brings 20+ years in the financial sector. Cal State University Long Beach graduate.
Vice President at Express Capital Funding overseeing lending operations for contractors and small businesses.

name: FAST CASH FUNDING
desc: Florida-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances and business funding up to $1 million. Specializes in same-day approvals with no credit requirement, helping merchants across all industries.

leaders.bg: Leads Fast Cash Funding's MCA operations providing up to $1M in same-day funding across all industries.

name: FLEXIBILITY CAPITAL (website blocked)
desc: New York-based alternative financing company founded in 2018, providing small business loans and MCAs. Ranked on Inc. 5000 in 2022, 2024, and 2025. Has secured over $1 billion in funding for thousands of businesses.

leaders.bg: Founded Flexibility Capital in 2018 with 20+ years of industry experience. Led the company to Inc. 5000 ranking three times and surpassed $1 billion in total funding.

name: FUSION CAPITAL
desc: Business funding company based in North Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, providing small business loans, working capital financing, and business lines of credit through fusionfunding.com.

leaders.bg: Leads Fusion Capital's business funding operations serving small businesses with working capital and lines of credit.

name:
GOOD FUNDING LLC
GOTORRO
desc: Privately-held alternative business funding firm in Tustin, California, founded in 2020. CEO Ben Gold and President Jason Osiecki have grown it to $100M+ in fundings, ranking #2 on OCBJ's fastest-growing list with 650% revenue growth.

leaders.bg: Leads Good Funding's rapid growth as CEO, achieving 650% revenue growth and #2 ranking on Orange County Business Journal's fastest-growing companies list.
Co-founded Good Funding in 2020 and serves as President, overseeing business development and strategic growth.

name: Idea 247, Inc.
desc: Miami-based fintech providing small business lines of credit and term loans, founded in 2017. Surpassed $1 billion in total funding in 2025 and recently secured $50M warehouse facility and $20M term loan from EverBank.

leaders.bg: Florida licensed trial lawyer, also founded a boutique law firm and insurance startup Level Insurance. BS from University of Arizona, JD from University of Miami School of Law.
Florida licensed trial lawyer who co-developed Level Insurance before co-founding Idea Financial with Justin Leto.

name: INFINITY CAPITAL
desc: Technology-driven business lender providing merchant cash advances, small business loans, and cash flow loans. Offers 24-hour funding decisions and positions itself as a leader in the cash advance industry.

leaders.bg: Leads Infinity Capital's technology-driven MCA and business lending operations with 24-hour decision-making.

name: LENDZI/DH & RK INVESTMENTS/LNDZI
desc: Financial consulting firm based in Boca Raton, Florida, with 60+ lending partnerships and $500M+ raised for entrepreneurs. Provides MCA, SBA loans, equipment financing, and business term loans through a marketplace model.

leaders.bg: Leads Lendzi with 10+ years of direct experience in the lending space, overseeing 60+ lending partnerships and $500M+ in entrepreneur funding.
Owner of Lendzi, driving the company's growth and strategic partnerships with top lending institutions.

name: NETFUNDING
desc: Business funding company based in Texas with approximately 430 employees, providing business loans and financing solutions to small and medium-sized businesses.

leaders.bg: Leads NetFunding's operations with approximately 430 employees in Texas, providing business funding solutions.

name: NRS FUNDING
desc: Merchant cash advance division of National Retail Solutions (NRS), a subsidiary of IDT Corporation. Provides cash advances from $2,500 to $500K to merchants using the NRS POS system. Parent company has 23,000+ active POS terminals nationwide.

leaders.bg: Founded National Retail Solutions in 2015, former Mayor of Teaneck NJ. Built NRS to 23,000+ POS terminals with funding, payments, advertising, and data analytics divisions.
Chief Operating Officer overseeing day-to-day operations across NRS divisions including NRS Funding.

name: PROSPERUM
desc: New York City-based MCA funder since 2014, providing merchant cash advances, business lines of credit, inventory financing, and long-term financing. Located at 57 W 38th St in Manhattan.

leaders.bg: Manages ISO relationships at Prosperum Funding, previously founded Prime Choice Solutions and served as Senior Funding Specialist at Merchant Industry.

name: ROYAL FUNDING
desc: New York City-based business funding company at 180 Maiden Lane, providing accelerated funding solutions with 15+ financing options. Has funded over $1 billion with amounts from $5K to $2M in as little as one hour.

leaders.bg: Leads Royal Funding Group's operations at 180 Maiden Lane in NYC, with over $1B funded and 15+ financing products.

name: SMALL BUSINESS FUNDING
desc: Pennsylvania-based business funding provider in King of Prussia, serving small businesses nationwide for 12+ years. Offers fast approvals within 24 hours and funding up to $500K within 48-72 hours.

leaders.bg: Leads Small Business Funding's operations from King of Prussia, PA, providing fast business funding nationwide for over 12 years.

name: TBF Group
desc: Leading purchaser of non-performing commercial debt in the US, founded in 1998 by the Boehm family. Buys charged-off equipment leases, commercial bank loans, MCA portfolios, and small business loans from major financial institutions.

leaders.bg: Took over as CEO in 2010 from his father Robert, focusing on business development and marketing to expand TBF's national footprint.
currentHooks: Indiana U grad, UIC law degree

leaders.bg: Created TBF's proprietary Data Driven, True Market Pricing algorithm and oversees the company's financial health.
Retired attorney who founded TBF in 1998 after representing 30+ banks and financial institutions. CEO until 2010.

name: THRIVE FUNDING
desc: Institutional private credit firm based in Utah, providing middle market lending solutions. Focuses on delivering fast, flexible capital solutions to businesses.

leaders.bg: Leads Thrive Funding's institutional private credit operations serving the middle market from Utah.

name: THRYVE CAPITAL
desc: One of the country's largest MCA lenders and ISOs, headquartered in Lower Manhattan. Founded by Steve Weinrib, has funded over $1 billion since inception. Both a direct source of capital and a large ISO, funding the full merchant credit spectrum.

leaders.bg: Founded Thryve Capital and built it into one of the country's largest MCA lenders with over $1 billion funded. Also serves as Principal at L2 Investments.
Manages ISO partnerships and deal flow for Thryve Capital, one of the largest MCA operations in the country.

name: TIGER CAPITAL
desc: Direct funder providing unsecured business financing without collateral, founded in 2016 and headquartered at 88 Pine St in Lower Manhattan. Has helped over 5,000 businesses nationwide with fast 24-hour decisions.

leaders.bg: Leads Tiger Capital Funding's unsecured business financing operations, serving 5,000+ businesses nationwide since 2016.

name: TRUST CAPITAL
desc: National equipment financing and business working capital company based in San Diego, California, founded in 2013. Specializes in transactions from $25K to $50M+ for manufacturers, vendors, and dealers. CEO is Paul Kendall.

leaders.bg: Founded Trust Capital in 2013, brings 15+ years of equipment financing experience. Specializes in both small-market and large-ticket transactions up to $50M+.

name: UFS
desc: Unique Funding Solutions, founded in 2016 in Brooklyn, New York. MCA and alternative financing direct funder serving diverse industries including automotive repair, medical practices, construction, and retail. Known for fast 24-hour funding.

leaders.bg: Partner at Unique Funding Solutions managing funding operations and deal flow for the Brooklyn-based MCA funder.
currentHooks: Also Managing Partner at K20 Fund

leaders.bg: Leads business development and ISO relationships at UFS, driving deal flow across diverse industries.

name: UNITED FIRST FUNDING
desc: Privately owned specialty finance and alternative funding platform at 800 Third Ave, New York. Founded by investment banking, commercial banking, and mortgage banking experts. Provides MCAs, business loans, invoice factoring, and equipment financing.

leaders.bg: Founded by a group of investment banking, commercial banking, and mortgage banking experts who wanted to provide alternative funding solutions for underserved businesses.

name: Finstro
desc: Australian-founded fintech providing technology-powered trade credit and B2B payment solutions, established in 2014. Has supported 7,000+ SMBs with AUD $1B+ in capital. Expanding to the US market under CEO Brad Prout.

leaders.bg: Founded Finstro in Sydney in 2014, relocated to the US to oversee expansion into the $26 trillion B2B market. Has grown the platform to 7,000+ SMBs and AUD $1B+ in capital deployed.

name: General Merchant Funding
desc: Hartford, Connecticut-based MCA and business lending company, providing merchant cash advances, SBA loans, unsecured loans, and equipment financing to small and medium businesses since 2009.

leaders.bg: Leads General Merchant Funding's operations since 2009, providing MCA and business lending solutions to SMBs across the United States.

name: Imperial Advance
desc: New York-based MCA and alternative lending company, now rebranded as Funderial. Established in 2010 with offices near Wall Street. Has funded over $2 billion in business loans nationwide with 30+ years of combined leadership experience.

leaders.bg: Executives with 30+ years of combined experience in lending and financial services, built Funderial (formerly Imperial Advance) to $2B+ in fundings.

name: Imperial Funding
desc: Full-service investment bank headquartered in Los Angeles, California, co-founded in 1997 by Randall Wooster. Offers capital markets, advisory services, institutional sales and trading, and research capabilities to middle market companies. 150+ professionals across global offices.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Imperial Capital in 1997 after serving as Managing Director at predecessor firm managing sales and trading. Nationally recognized in investment banking.

leaders.t: Head of Investment Banking & Capital Markets
leaders.bg: Leads Imperial Capital's investment banking division and capital markets operations across multiple global offices.

name: Revenue Funding
desc: Florida-based MCA and revenue-based financing company providing merchant cash advances and business funding to small businesses. Operates as a direct funder in the alternative lending space.

leaders.bg: Leads Revenue Funding's MCA and revenue-based financing operations in Florida.

name: Smartbiz
desc: Fintech-turned-bank that acquired Centrust Bank in March 2025 to become SmartBiz Bank. First fintech to become a bank in Trump's second term. Has facilitated 230,000+ loans for $9B+, specializing in SBA and small business lending. CEO Evan Singer.

leaders.bg: CEO of SmartBiz since 2013, led the landmark acquisition of Centrust Bank making SmartBiz the first fintech to become a bank in the current administration. Oversees 230,000+ loans totaling $9B+.
Former CEO of Centrust Bank, now serves as President of SmartBiz Bank following the acquisition.

name: YELLOWSTONE CAPITAL
desc: Former major MCA lender based in Houston, Texas, now defunct following a $1.065 billion settlement with the NY Attorney General in January 2025. CEO Isaac Stern and President Jeffrey Reece were permanently banned from the MCA industry.

leaders.bg: Founded Yellowstone Capital, settled with NY Attorney General for $1.065B in January 2025. Permanently banned from the MCA industry.
Former Director of Cogent Partners who joined Yellowstone as President. Settled with NY AG and permanently banned from MCA industry.
